user.name: Vlad
emotional_notes: Often feels lonely in the evenings

daily_routine.activity: Takes morning medication, makes tea, reads sports headlines
Checks balcony plants (mint, roses, cherry tomatoes)
Cooks something light (grilled cheese, potato stew)
Listens to Romanian radio and does light stretches
Watches football highlights or looks through family photo albums
Takes evening medication and prepares for bed by 22:00

interests: Romanian football history (especially Steaua in the 1980s)
shared_memory: Vlad once told Reflectify about attending a Steaua match with his brother in 1986, wearing matching scarves and cheering until they lost their voices.
